text: I am new to HubSpot and I have been tasked with writing a bi-directional SSIS integration between D365 and HubSpot. I have installed the KingswaySoft HubSpot adapter and am just getting started.  Has anyone done this before?  If so, is there a way to trigger an event for a record transfer from HubSpot based on a field changing - such as a records modified date?  Any information would be helpful.  Thanks in advance.

Anyone able to point me in the right direction with this? Debug is showing that a blog post cannot be prerenderd. What do I need to modify to get prerendering to work? Thanks!
```This page currently CANNOT be prerendered. To improve your site speed and user experience, address the following issue(s):
This page uses an uncacheable expression. (expression prefix contact.)
This page uses an uncachable value. (value contact)
This page uses an uncacheable filter. (filter random)```

Hey <@UDPA7JFHA>, your page cannot be prerendered as long as you’re using the expression, value, and filter listed. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/cdn/prerendering#hs_cos_wrapper_widget_1622649689085|They’re all incompatible with prerendering>.

Can you find alternatives to them?
